library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)

# Abstract 

Examining life expectancy plot 

# Life Expectancy Analysis  

```{r}
data("gapminder_unfiltered")

gapminder_unfiltered %>%
  group_by(year)%>%
  summarize(max(lifeExp)) %>%
  arrange(desc(lifeExp))

```

#Life Expectancy Analysis 

```{r}
data("gapminder_unfiltered")
gapminder_unfiltered %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  filter(lifeExp == max(lifeExp)) %>%
  select(country, lifeExp, year) %>%
  arrange(year) ->
  sumdat
```
